{{also|Zwölf}} ==German== {{cardinalbox|de|11|12|13|elf|dreizehn|ord=zwölfte}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{alter|de|zwölfe||now colloquial, regional, or nonstandard; chiefly when used without a following noun}} * {{alter|de|zwölwe||rare nonstandard spelling of the above}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|zwelif}} from an original {{m|goh||*twelif}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*twalif}}.
